attributes.action: To Solve Religious Trouble By getting Rid of Religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition would like religion to be outlawed as it is detremental to the safety and wellbeing of this mighty nation.
This would be done by; burning ALL religious paraphenalia and knocking down ALL religious buildings, and executing ALL reeligious leaders
